text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fallin on my face
Sky's a shade of gray
But your smile lightens up the day
Turns my blues away

[Verse 2]
Puddle jumpin in the street
Laughin at the clouds
Your laughter makes my heart beat
Breakin through the doubt

[Chorus]
Sunshine on a rainy day
You always find a way
Sunshine on a rainy day
You make the gray fade away

[Verse 3]
Umbrella can’t keep me dry
When you're by my side
Even when the tears fall down
You can turn the tide

[Bridge]
Dance with me in the pouring rain
Forget about the pain
With you
I feel alive again
Love runs through my veins

[Chorus]
Sunshine on a rainy day
You always find a way
Sunshine on a rainy day
You make the gray fade away
title: Sunshine on a Rainy Day
